entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 7:50 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure: 99.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to periods of snow near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
